NetAlertX.more_info:
NetAlertX

Admin page

To access admin interface go to URL: http://[SERVERIP]:[Web-Port]

Note: this Rockon uses the net=host option.

20211.description: Rockon UI Link Port. Recommended: 20211. This port has to be the same as the subsequent Web-port later in the configuration, so the admin pages can be accessed from within the Rockon page.
20211.label: Rockon Web Port

/app/config.description: Choose a share for NetAlertX configuration. E.g.: create a Share called netalertx-config for this purpose alone.
/app/config.label: NetAlertX config

/app/db.description: Choose a share for NetAlertX database. E.g.: create a Share called netalertx-db for this purpose alone.
/app/db.label: NetAlertX db

PORT.description: Enter the WebUI Web-port number. Recommended: 20211. This port has to be the same as the Rockon UI Link port, configured earlier. This ensures that the admin pages for NetAlertX are accessible via Web Browser
PORT.label: NetAlertX Web Port
